cards.name: Pinsir
cards.text: It grips prey with its pincers until the prey is torn in half. What it can't tear, it tosses far.

attacks.name: Grip and Squeeze
attacks.text: The Defending Pokémon can't retreat during your opponent's next turn.

cards.name: Seedot
cards.text: When it dangles from a tree branch, it looks just like an acorn. It enjoys scaring other Pokémon.

attacks.name: Trip Over

cards.name: Kricketot
cards.text: Its legs are short. Whenever it stumbles, its stiff antennae clack with a xylophone-like sound.

attacks.name: Double Headbutt

cards.name: Kricketune

cards.name: Pansage
cards.text: This Pokémon dwells deep in the forest. Eating a leaf from its head whisks weariness away as if by magic.

cards.name: Simisage

cards.name: Litwick
